```{r}
#| label: load libraries

library(dplyr)
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
```

```{r}
#| label: clean dataset

state_capitals <- read.table(here::here("state_capitals_ll.txt"))
state_capitals <- state_capitals %>% filter(!V1 %in% c("DC", "PR", "US"))

state_capitals_clean <- state_capitals %>%
  mutate(
    state = V1,
    latitudes = V2,
    longitudes = V3
  ) %>%
  select(state, latitudes, longitudes)

state_capitals_clean
```

# Pass Times for U.S State Capitals

## 1.

```{r}
res = GET("https://api.g7vrd.co.uk/v1/satellite-passes/25544/32.36154/-86.27912.json")
```

```{r}
library(lubridate)

data = fromJSON(rawToChar(res$content))

data$passes %>%
  mutate(
    tca_readable = ymd_hms(tca, tz = "UTC")
  )
```
